trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_SEQ_00<tab>Munifrid seeks a seasoned adventurer for an important task.

TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_000<tab><var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you are well known for your deeds as a soldier. On this day, however, I would call upon your broad experiences as an adventurer.

TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_001<tab>As for the situation at hand, it would seem that part of our patrol route has been claimed as territory by a fearsome zu nestling. Yet we cannot simply choose to circumvent the area, lest we risk providing an unobserved entry point for imperial scouts.

TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_002<tab>My men and I will gladly go toe-to-toe with any military opponent. But nothing in our training has prepared us to combat a foe which can soar through the ravines and swoop down upon us with impunity.
TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_003<tab>My comrade here almost lost his arm to such an attack, and I fear it is only a matter of time ere the creature makes a kill...unless you kill it first.
TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_004<tab>The nestling surveys its domain from a narrow pillar of rock to the northeast. Pray find this predator, and end the threat to our patrols.

TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_005<tab>We might take the thing down eventually, but too much of our own blood would stain those rock walls. For a monster-slayer of your caliber, however, I should hope it will prove no great challenge...
TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_010<tab>The nestling is slain, then? I knew I had chosen the right <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> for the job.
TEXT_STMBDZ921_02877_MUNIFRID_000_011<tab>I am grateful you came along before any lives were lost to that monstrous bird. You have our thanks!
